<p>* **<object data="http://www.twitch.tv/widgets/archive_embed_player.swf" height="378" id="clip_embed_player_flash" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="420"><param name="movie" value="http://www.twitch.tv/widgets/archive_embed_player.swf"><param name="allowScriptAccess" value="always"><param name="allowNetworking" value="all"><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"><param name="flashvars" value="title=KSP-TV%253A%2BShimmy%2527s%2BSpace%2BQuest&channel=ksptv&auto_play=false&start_volume=25&archive_id=483167538"></object><br/><a class="trk" href="http://www.twitch.tv/ksptv">Watch live video from KSPTV on TwitchTV</a></p>

<p><strong>ShimmytheJJ</strong> is the newest member of the <a href="http://bit.ly/12Q5ono"><strong>KSP-TV</strong></a> team. Say hello to him on his way to conquering the galaxy. Watch <strong>Shimmy’s Space Quest,</strong> <strong>Tuesdays at 8 PM CST</strong>, only on <a href="http://bit.ly/12Q5ono"><strong>KSP-TV</strong></a>.</p>
And if your in America, happy Thanksgiving (aka Turkey day)
and if not, happy firday(or thursday, depending i guess)
It's Friday, Friday. Gotta get down on Friday. Everybody's lookin' forward to the weekend, weekend.
